amendment.description: To require contractors to notify small business concerns that have been included in offers relating to contracts let by Federal agencies.

vote.text: Amendment SA 216 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 43.

action.text: Amendment SA 216 proposed by Senator Landrieu for Senator Casey. (consideration: CR S1716-1717, S1744-1746; text: CR S1717) To require contractors to notify small business concerns that have been included in offers relating to contracts let by Federal agencies.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 216 proposed by Senator Landrieu for Senator Casey.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 216 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 43.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 216 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 43.
